text: Signals from Affymetrix .CEL files were normalized with the robust multi-array analysis (RMA) (Irizarry et al. 2003, Nucleic Acid Res. 31: e15) using the R software packages by Bioconductor (

protocol.text: One-week-old seedlings were removed from MS media and transferred onto paper towels for 2h or 24h.

text: Arabidopsis plants were surface sterilized by soaking for 20 min in 25% (v/v) commercial Clorox (final concentration of 1.3% sodium hypochlorite) and 0.05 % (v/v) Triton X-100 (Fisher Scientific, Hampton, NH, USA), and then rinsing four times with distilled water. Seeds were germinated on MS media and grown in a growth cabinet at 22 degrees Celcius with a 16h day photoperiod.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, min temperature = 22, temperature unit = C, media = 0.5 MS media)

Seedlings were snap frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored in a -80 degrees Celsius freezer until extracted. RNA was extracted from frozen seedlings using the RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen), according to the manufacturer's instructions.
